name: Mass Effect: Andromeda – Deluxe Recruit Edition
summary:
Mass Effect: Andromeda – Deluxe Recruit Edition takes players on a mission to find a new home for humanity, in the Andromeda galaxy. As the Pathfinder, you lead humanity’s fight for survival. This edition includes the Turian Soldier and Asari Adept Multiplayer Recruit Packs which ensures you will join the battle well equipped with the Turian and Asari Multiplayer Characters and a selection of special weapons, items and boosts. The hope for humanity lies on your shoulders. You must ask yourself…How far will you go? 
 
BONUS CONTENT: Turian Soldier and Asari Adept Characters and Items 
 
Turian Soldier: These soldiers are tough and versatile powerhouses. Though soldiers’ primary tools are their weapons, they utilize advanced armor technology to give themselves an edge. 
 
Turian Soldier kit: 
o Uncommon Character (x2) Turian Soldier 
o Rare Weapon (x2) X5 Ghost 
o Uncommon Weapon (x2) Widow 
o Rare Mod #1 Assault Rifle Barrel 
o Rare Mod #2 Sniper Rifle Barrel 
o Uncommon Mod #1 Assault Rifle Magazine 
o Uncommon Mod #2 Sniper Rifle Thermal Clip 
o Equipment Stronghold Package 
o Jumbo Supply Pack 1 (5x): 1st Aid, Ammo & Revive Packs, Cobra RPG, Boosters 
o 100% XP Enhancers 5 
o Andromeda Points 600 
 
Asari Adept: The Asari is a great starter class that is lightly armored, with a focus on biotics as the primary form of attack and defense, specializing in crowd control and damage. 
 
Asari Adept kit: 
o Uncommon Character (x2) Asari Adept 
o Rare Weapon (x2) Scattershot 
o Uncommon Weapon (x2) Cyclone 
o Rare Mod #1 Shotgun Barrel 
o Rare Mod #2 Assault Rifle Barrel 
o Uncommon Mod #1 Shotgun Spare Clip 
o Uncommon Mod #2 Assault Rifle Magazine 
o Equipment Commando Package 
o Jumbo Supply Pack 1 (5x): 1st Aid, Ammo & Revive Packs, Cobra RPG and Boosters 
o 100% XP Enhancers 5 
o Andromeda Points 600

esrb.synopsis: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
